original_title: The Upsetter: The Life and Music of Lee Scratch Perry
overview: The Upsetter tells the fascinating story of Lee Scratch Perry a visionary musician and artist from poor rural Jamaica who journeyed to the big city of Kingston in the late 1950â€™s with dreams of making it in the burgeoning record industry. He burst upon the scene with a brand new sound, inventing a genre of music that would come to be called Reggae, discovering a young Bob Marley and gaining international recognition as a record producer and solo artist. Soon he was being called upon by artists as diverse as The Clash and Paul McCartney to provide his unique sound.
tagline: The Life and Music of Lee Scratch Perry
title: The Upsetter: The Life and Music of Lee Scratch Perry
